mapper.select: SELECT u.id as u_id, u.nick_name as u_nick_name, u.regist_time as u_regist_time, uc.user_name as uc_user_name, uc.phone AS uc_phone, uc.email AS uc_email FROM tb_user_info u LEFT JOIN tb_user_account uc on u.user_id=uc.id WHERE u.id=#{id}
SELECT u.id, u.nick_name, u.regist_time, u.constellation, u.sex FROM tb_user_info u ORDER by u.regist_time limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT u.id , u.nick_name, u.age , u.sex , u.regist_time , us.status_grade AS "status.statusGrade", ua.phone AS "userAccount.phone" FROM tb_user_info u LEFT JOIN tb_user_status us on u.id=us.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_account ua on u.user_id=ua.id WHERE us.status=3 order by us.status_grade desc
